pages.text: Use $(l:amazons/items/amazon_cell_vial)Amazon Cell Vials$(/l) on this block to mutate the cells into their $(l:amazons/items/omega_amazon_cell_vial)Omega$(/l), $(l:amazons/items/alpha_amazon_cell_vial)Alpha$(/l), $(l:amazons/items/sigma_amazon_cell_vial)Sigma$(/l), or $(l:amazons/items/neo_amazon_cell_vial)Neo$(/l) variants
